name: Prison Chainball Massacre
description: Prison Chainball Massacre is a fast paced, mindless arcade brawler set in a prison arena where your only weapon is the Chainball.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible, at least 256MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
